{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Congestion Charge and Low Emissions Zone factsheets"}

These factsheets include information about how many people pay the
        Congestion Charge (CC) and the Low Emission Zone (LEZ) charge and the number of
        Penalty Charge Notices that are issued.

Around two-thirds of embassies in London pay the Congestion Charge, but a minority refuse to. We pursue all unpaid Congestion Charge fees and related Penalty Charge Notices and are pushing for the matter to be taken up at the International Court of Justice. Here we publish a list of embassies which owe unpaid charges.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Congestion Charging outstanding embassy debt (from February 2003 to December 2018)","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/cclez-online-factsheet-embassy-debt.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 225KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
